website_summaries.verdict: Post-op patients who seek at-home leg massage therapy will benefit from this compression machine. Swelling, circulation problems, and fluid retention can be reduced considerably.
pros: Smaller unit for at-home use – easier to transport than hospital models
Works well for fluid reduction and compression
As easy to use as an automatic blood pressure machine
cons: Defective units either fail to power up or suddenly stop working
Pressure can be too intense, even at lower settings
No massage action, just inflation and deflation

customer_reviews.title: surprising
customer_reviews.text: Give it a minute before you make up your mind about these. When I first put them on, I thought it seemed similar to a blood pressure cuff! And it kind of is at first, because it uses air pressure to massage. But, it doesn't just tighten and release the whole cuff. It actually works top to bottom and back up, etc. It has settings for how much pressure you're comfortable with, and two different modes. I like it because, working from home and not getting out much lately, my legs are not getting any exercise and my muscles hurt. This actually helps me.
customer_reviews.author: kharkrider

customer_reviews.title: Very useful Leg Air massager for anyone who got Leg pain
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife’s mom as she’s got leg muscle pain and it really helped her a lot to get better. She doesn’t feel the pain that much now as before. It fits any leg Size and Very adjustable as well. It’s really easy to carry anywhere and use it anywhere u want without the cord after it’s fully charged. even my wife is using it when she’s got muscles pain.
customer_reviews.author: Radeepa Kiribathgala

customer_reviews.title: Bought one for myself after giving as a gift and Daughter said they are great.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I did. I am 83 about 60% mobile and I had to repair my roof after heavy rains in South Florida which I did, Next day I couuldn't bend feet as muscle calfs had tighten going up and down ladder rungs. Wondered if this would work put on and took a nap on couch. To my surprise, woke up calfs working as normal. I have used now about five times and my two Dachunds like the noise of the unit too.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Does it work?
customer_reviews.text: Does it work for pain relief? That's a question that you'll need to answer. For me, that's a no. I was hoping that it would aid in the circulation and pain relief, but didn't get either. It's better than most for air pressure compression, but yearned for something pressing into or massaging my leg instead of squeezing it. So not a fan
customer_reviews.author: MAV

customer_reviews.title: I definitely want to write
customer_reviews.text: I don't really leave reviews, but I definitely want to write. The reason I bought this product, I had a bad back disc. So the calf cramps were very severe. Every night, I suffered. However, I was told that calf massage is helpful for calf cramps. So I am using it for the 4th day after purchasing it. Since I used it, my sleep has never been interrupted. This is really work and feel really good
customer_reviews.author: Sweetpea

customer_reviews.title: Good product .. Buy it ! Update tearing off from stitches
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect product for calf pain. Just make sure the nozzle is placed right while fitting it on your calf. I would recommend if u have diabetic calf pain due to statin tablets I used it on had too and felt like BP machine on both hands . It is a good product for the price.. not sure if u use it regularly on hands it may help clean blocked arteries Update August 20.. I like the product but it started tearing off from the stitches. The product cannot handle daily use so buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: online shoper

customer_reviews.title: Performs well...
customer_reviews.text: My wife suffers with muscle pain in her lower legs. Using these helps a lot. She is very pleased with them and anything that helps her pleases me. I would recommend this as I believe it does what it promises.
customer_reviews.author: William Denton

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a plastic surgeon and advise this for after surgery “down time”. Also great when I have been on my feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s easy to put on and is rechargeable. It seems to work fine. I’d tried another manufacturer and the Velcro was so strong that I couldn’t use it. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel S. Druce

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I had to return tge Item because my Doctor told me that i wouldn't benefit from it But it seem a very good Product
customer_reviews.author: BABYSILVANO

customer_reviews.title: I love mine and have gifted a pair
customer_reviews.text: I recently had vascular surgery for varicose veins. The sleeves are improving the healing process by increasing circulation
customer_reviews.author: M. D. mendes

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my calves every day and the soreness under my calves is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for almost 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product on 5/16/20 and it stopped working 7/22/20. The remote control will not turn on even when charged. I'm not sure if the remote is broken or the charging cord. Other than this I feel that the product worked well. Purchase the 3 year warranty if you decide to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dad and they really help get the circulation going in his legs. Very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: It works excellently.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product for leg cramps. It helps reduce pain wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Disliked it seemed smaller than expected other than that good item
customer_reviews.author: really confused

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my grandma who gets lots of pain in her legs and she says it’s really helped her
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for proper blood circulation.
customer_reviews.text: This a great product for people wanting to improve their blood circulation. Folks with sedentary lifestyle will especially benefit from this. Can be used cordless as well. Perfect amount of features and very user friendly. Will definitely recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep

customer_reviews.title: Good but not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: After surgery I was in love with the one they used at the hospital , so I bought this. At first I didn’t like it because I made the mistake of putting it on too tight and it hurt. I tried it again less tight and I liked it. Then discovered the sequence mode and finally found what I was looking for. It’s not as good as the one at the hospital, but it definitely helps a lot. I could finally fall asleep again with no leg pain or swelling. Needs better instructions.
customer_reviews.author: G. NunezTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: As promised and great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my mother who was in a care home. Wanted something easy and portable for the caregivers to use. These are exactly what I wanted. They charge up and are easy for the staff to use. I got a pair for me. I'm a nurse and you know what that means lately. These things are as good or better than the things in the hospital. Get them if you are on your feet... suffer from cramps... have circulation issues... they are FANTASTIC.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: I had a reaction to the material the unit was made of and so can not use it at all. Sorry guys.
customer_reviews.author: bookwormser

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is outstanding! It is easy to set up and simple to use! There are three levels of compression. The highest level is very high-level compression! It's a really good squeeze/massage! There are two different compression patterns. I am quite pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Its leg massage is portable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mom as gift because I did not massage for her daily. I leave far away and only visit elders in the weekend. My mom love it she use leg massage everyday. The only problem I have is my dad complains: “ you love mom more than dad” why can he has one too? What can I said :( Anyway thank you ! It is work great for blood circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Bookinator123

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this machine
customer_reviews.text: Takes care of my painful leg cramps and is easy and convenient to use
customer_reviews.author: V. Orcutt

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: When hospitalized they used similar 'sleeves' on my lower legs to prevent blood clots. The hospital ones seemed to inflate very smoothly from top to bottom and back again. These are not as smooth. Pockets on the top or bottom inflate and deflate one at a time. I do still feel the benefit when I have to sit for a long time. I have also used them on arms, hands, feet, and even sat on them for a tush massage. Works great for all. Not as fancy as the hospital version but definitely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good on calf and thighs
customer_reviews.text: second purchase first one had for many years just wore out good 👍 for calf and thighs useful when don't want to get out full legs massage 😅 like remote 😅
customer_reviews.author: Janice W.

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: My leg like to get sore at night. It feel better since i used this leg massage 2-3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Portable, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little device and the sleeves. It helps with the swelling in my calves, and the heavy feeling I get with it. I didn’t rate for pain, because it helps in a roundabout way for pain and discomfort. I’ve had this for over 6 months, and it’s still working well. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: debzstuff

product_meta.title: Amzdeal Leg Massager for Circulation Calf Massager Built-in Rechargeable Battery Cordless Design, Suitable for Legs, Arms, Feet, Home Use 【Update】
feature_bullets: 🔥WARM SATISFIED SERVICE - Amzdeal always offers warm and satisfied customer service. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us please. We strive to make you 100% satisfied.

🎁 POWERFUL LEG MASSAGER - Compared to the traditional leg massager, updated Amzdeal leg massager has more powerful and adjustable pressure level. It can deliver a deeper and relaxing massage for your calves. Also, the leg massager is used not only for the legs, but also for the arms and feet.

🎁 BUILT-IN RECHARGEABLE BATTERY- Amzdeal leg massager offers 2-hour massage experience after fully charged, which makes it convenient to be used anywhere such as home, office, car, trains and so on. Also, calf massager can be used all day while plugged in.

🎁 2 MODES & 3 INTENSITIES - The leg massager for circulation supports 2 massage modes and 3 intensities. You can choose the suitable massage mode and intensity according to your need. And it is helpful to get better massage effect.

🎁 ADJUSTABLE LEG WRAPS SIZE - The calf massager can fit for the most people with the max leg circumference 25.6 inch. You just need to adjust leg wraps size via the velcro and make it fit perfectly on your calves, arms or feet.
🎁 GREAT GIFT FOR YOU OR YOUR FAMILY - Amzdeal leg massager can help you relax muscles, relieve pain and improve circulation. It is a perfect present for you or your family.
